doctor.name: Dr. Jahan Afroza Khanam Lucky
doctor.info: Dr. Jahan Afroza Khanam Lucky is a Cancer Specialist in Rangpur. Her qualification is MBBS, M.Phil (Radiotherapy). She is working as an Assistant Professor & Head of the Department of Radiotherapy in Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Onco Pathology, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Jahan Afroza Khanam Lucky at Onco Pathology, Rangpur is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Nusrat Jahan
doctor.specialty: Child Diseases, Child Blood Diseases & Child Cancer Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Nusrat Jahan is a Child Specialist in Rangpur. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Pediatrics). She is a Associate Professor & Head, Pediatric Hematology & Oncology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Nusrat Jahan at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Dhap (Opposite to Police Fari), Jail Road, Rangpur
